options: ['on the bed.', 'on the dresser', 'under the bed', 'in the schoolbag']
article:
Dear Jane,
I have to  go to work  now. I prepare  these things for you. Your schoolbag is on the desk. Your pen ,books,keys and your school card are in your schoolbag. Your clothes and hat are on the dresser . The shoes  are under the bed. Don't _ your breakfast . It's in the microwave oven .
Love you.
Mom
